headline: NAD Holds Puffery Analysis Depends On Material Connection Disclosure
summary: Church & Dwight ran ads for TheraBreath Mouthwash that featured a dentist in a white lab coat identifying him as Dr. Harold Katz. In some of the ads, Dr. Katz holds the product and states:It's a...
